Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional item that has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and unique benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I understand its worth to you is $10000, and based on its value and the effort put into it, I am offering it to you for $11500. This price reflects a fair compromise between its market value and my goal to ensure you receive a product that truly meets your standards. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
